message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate you getting back to me. While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is a very competitive offer for a product of this quality.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm happy to pay $9,000 for the product.  This is a fair price given my budget and the value I see in this item. Let me know what you think.
